body.name: UMIDIGI A13S (4GB+64GB) Unlocked Cell Phone, 6.7" Ultra-Large Full Screen Smartphone with 5150mAh Battery + 16MP AI Dual Camera, Unlocked Android 11 Phone with Dual SIM (Global 4G LTE)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 50 mins
features: 【6.7" Ultra-large Full Screen & 5150mAh Massive Battery】UMIDIGI A13S features a 6.7-inch super large display, bringing an immersive viewing experience with vivid colors and rich details. The 5150mAh massive battery ensured the long usage for swiping, reading, gaming, etc.

【Unisoc T310 Quad-Core Processor & 4GB + 64GB】 UMIDIGI A13S is powered by an Unisoc T310 processor which is processed by TSMC 12nm FFC Process. Its CPU contains an A75-Cortex of 2.0GHz and three A55-Cortex of 1.8GHz. With up to 256GB of expandable storage ensure you can enjoy a lag-free experience with sufficient space for your games, music, videos, and more.

【16MP AI Dual Camera】UMIDIGI A13S With a dramatic 120 ° field of view from a 16MP ultra-wide-angle camera, you can shoot clearer and wider landscapes. It’s easy to capture every moment with clarity thanks to the 16MP main camera.

【Composite AG Matte Finish】 Dazzling Design, Smooth Touch UMIDIGI Unlocked phones A13S back-finish offers a frosted surface that has an anti-fingerprint feature and a silky hand feeling. The very best size of 8.7mm and 200g, bringing an unparalleled hold. Every tiny part is carved intently.

【Dual 4G VoLTE& Global Network】UMIDIGI A13S unlocked smartphones support dual SIM. Both SIM slots are compatible with 4G, and support 4G VoLTE in both slots simultaneously. It is compatible with most of the GSM and CDMA network. Please kindly note that, the phone is not compatible with the new network of ATT& Cricket & Verizon since 1 Jan 2022). If there is any connection problem, you can contact us anytime.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.6 3.6 out of 5 stars 295 ratings 3.6 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: IMPORTANT NOTES(Please Read Before Purchase): UMIDIGI A13S DON'T work with AT&T, Cricket and Verizon! If the purchased UMIDIGI A13S unlocked cell phone cannot use network data, please follow the steps below: you can adjust the APN setting manually first. Step1: GET THE APN PARAMETERS Solution 1. you can search "your phone carrier + APN" on google/or call the carriers to check the APN parameters. Solution 2. you can also insert your SIM card into another phone(that can access Internet normally) to get the APN parameters. You can check in phone: Settings - Network & Internet - Mobile network - Access Point Names (APN) -Click the mobile card -Copy all the APN parameter Step2: ADD APN PARAMETERS into A13S Plug in the SIM card to A13S - Settings - Network & Internet - Mobile network - Access Point Names (APN) - Click Plus on the upper right corner - Add the correct APN parameters.

Display: 6.7" Ultra-large Full ScreenRAM: 4GBROM: 32GB/64GB(Supports expandable storage up to 256GB)Battery: 5150mAhFast Charging: 10WDimensions: Height: 162.2mm, Width: 75mm, Thickness: 9.2mmWeight: 200gPackage Contents: 1x Phone; 1x Screen Protector (pre-applied); 1x Phone Case; 1x Type-C Cable; 1x Power Adapter; 1x SIM Tray Ejector; 1x Quick Start Guide *Actual capacity may vary due to various factors. As the operating system occupies a portion of the ROM, actual available space is lesser than stated. As the phone comes with pre-installed applications, the actual storage size is smaller than stated.

Camera features Ultra wide-angle mode, Steady handheld night photography, Portrait mode, Panorama mode, HDR, AI Beautify, Ultra-wide angle edge distortion correction, Dual LED flash, Face recognition, Real-time filters 16MP AI Dual Camera 16MP High-clarity Main Camera 8MP Ultra Wide Angle Lens, 120° Front camera: 8 Megapixel F/2.2 Aperture Super Night Mode: Brighter & Clearer The super night mode brings more brightness to photos, allowing you to shoot in low light without losing the colors and details of your creations.

Stylish and slim Engraved with great care in every detail. You can enjoy perfect smoothness and slimness. Faster and Safer Easily unlock your phone, intelligent and safe. It can lightning-fast recognize your face and unlock your device at the same time. Smart Key, One Click With the customizable shortcut key on the left side, you can quickly access the APPs and functions you want with only one finger. Single-click, double-click or long-press, fully controls your device only in three actions. Dual SIM + microSD Support dual Nano-SIM card and dedicated microSD expansion memory card Bluetooth 5.0, Bluetooth HID Supports protocols: IEEE802.11 b/g/n/ac. Supports 2.4G Wi-Fi / 5G Wi-Fi

Dual Mics for Noise-cancellation Block out loud noise disturbances and deliver your love clearly to your loved ones. Headset-free FM Radio Wherever you are, you can listen to the FM radio without headphones and mobile data. Type-C port The charging speed is greatly improved. At the same time, Type-C also supports bidirectional charging. In addition, the data transmission speed of Type-C is significantly improved compared to the original type. Android 11 system Faster and smoother--UMIDIGI A13S runs the latest Stock Android 11 and provides powerful device controls and an easy way to manage conversations, privacy settings and more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product for Price
reviews.reviewText: Shipped quickly and came in original packaging with case, screen protector, charger and manual. Seller was attentive, sending product information for start up and phone is easy to use. If you need a cheap phone that will do the job as well as your current android but won't be heartbroken if you lose it, this is your product. The phone is completely customizable, from home screen, to navigation bar, screen gestures, apps, and quick search. Camera quality is great, including different picture modes. Battery is long lasting, set up is simple and the phone itself feels sturdy and well made. Screen sensitivity is very good and there is no touch delay or glitching. I haven't had it long, so I can't say much on long term wear and tear, but overall I'll still give this 5 stars until something goes wrong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not work on Hello Mobile
reviews.reviewText: The phone looks good but it doesn't work with Hello Mobile which runs on T-Mobile network. The APN parameters mentioned didn't help. A tech support from the network says the phone has a voice restriction since I was able to send texts and get data but unable to make calls. I'm not sure if this applies to other companies but for Hello Mobile, it certainly did not work. If you're buying this, be cautious about making a full transition of apps and personal info before verifying it works. I wasted two days with this. Returned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A very good budget friendly Phone
reviews.reviewText: I was in the market for a new phone and decided to give this one a chance and so I've been using the phone for about a week. And it's pretty good. The battery life is pretty decent, there's a lot of customization to make this phone a daily driver like being able to swap the back button and recent button and other stuff like that. I wish there were more accessories for this phone like temper glass or different phone cases. Other than that, it's a pretty good phone. It has a lot of potential.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Meets expectations for the price
reviews.reviewText: I've used a large number of inexpensive android phones over the last few years, and this one entirely meets my expectations for a phone that costs less than 150$.The notable features of this phone include a very bright screen, a case that makes the power button difficult to accidentally press by mistake in your pocket, a chipset that is powerful enough provide a relatively smooth experience in most apps, a pre applied plastic screen protector, a lightweight but still relatively high build quality, and entirely stock android 11.The things that disappoint me the most are the battery life and the camera quality.Overall it's a solid choice for a phone if your not looking for top of the line performance and quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Reception at its worst.
reviews.reviewText: I have had an S1, 2x F1 play and A new Bison. This phone pissed me off way too many times. If I blew my nose it would drop connection. If I could SEE a tree it would drop connection ect. I wanted to like it. I wanted to buy it as a spare phone to be replaced in less than 6 months. The connection issues suck on this phone. The battery life was amazing. I understand its just a cheap phone but I honestly think on the hardware side they cheaped out on the modem/transmitter. Now this could be just my experience with this specific phone but I got a feeling its not just me. My plan was to buy this phone and then upgrade to the new F3 5G in a few months making this a spare for just in case. Having to deal with Umidigi Was not a fun experience. From only getting emails between 4-5:30 AM to wanting me to provide a video of dropped connections to only wanting me to email them directly and not involve Amazon this just all put a bad taste in my mouth. Umidigi you let me down and I had no choice than to but a phone from someone else. Do better Umidigi

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked for trip to Ecuador
reviews.reviewText: This phone worked for an international trip to Ecuador and Galápagos Islands. When we landed at the airport, SIM cards were purchased and immediately was able to use this phone. I am an iPhone user but was able to figure out how to use the android interface pretty quickly. I made sure to download all updates to the operating system of the phone and the apps(google translate, Whats App, etc) that I would need using Wi-Fi.The picture/video quality seemed good but in my opinion iPhone 14 seems to take a better picture/video.Not sure if this is normal but when turning on the phone took a long time to get to the main screen. Once it’s on though it operated fairly quick and smooth.I would recommended this to a friend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does Not work abroad
reviews.reviewText: It doesn't work abroad as advertised. Though the phone was on the entire time, callers could not reach me. It was so frustrating. I kept switching it on and off hoping this would reboot and help but nothing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars VERY NICE BUDGET PHONE
reviews.reviewText: Ive had this phone for a week,and i can say,for the price is a very good phone,excellent battery life,good reception(i have tmobile and is very good in myarea) i havent had the chance to try with 2 sim cards but i tried both sim card slot and work fine. ONLY thing i didnt like about this phone is that does not have a fingerprint scanner,but hey iphone devices dont have it neither and well still are extremely expensive phones. probably is me that im not used to the face unlock method. i really recommend this phone is you are looking for a budget phone.PD i loved the smart key feature,you cand set 3 apps or feature with that key...really nice

Un teléfono con unas características técnicas muy buena y a un precio de risa. Un tamaño perfecto. Por ahora funciona perfectamente pero no llevo ni 4 días con él. Si veo que falla o se ralentiza o algo ya vendré a editar.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen teléfono para el precio que se vende.
reviews.reviewText: Buena calidad de imagen en la pantalla, para uso del trabajo, llamadas, SMS, Wassap, etc. Buena presentación y agradable de materiales, cumple perfectamente con lo que yo quería a un precio muy barato. Estoy completamente satisfecho

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 30, 2023

reviews.reviewTitle: Sehr gut zu bedienen optimale Größe
reviews.reviewText: Funktioniert einwandfrei.Es muss nicht immer Teuer sein

reviews.reviewTitle: 値段的に見て良いと思います。
reviews.reviewText: ここ何年か、UMIDIGI製品を使ってきました。この商品が4機種目です。アンドロイドに余計なものが入っておらず、スッキリとしているのが好きです。自分用としては、良好に使えています。もちろん、低価格商品ですから、年がら年中スマホを使うタイプの人には物足りないものかと思います。
